spirit:field.spirit:name: dir
spirit:field.spirit:description: GPIO Direction - one bit per GPIO 1'b0 : Input 1'b1 : Output

spirit:field.spirit:name: out
spirit:field.spirit:description: GPIO Output - one bit per GPIO

spirit:field.spirit:name: in
spirit:field.spirit:description: GPIO Input - one bit per GPIO

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Pending register - This indicates which GPIO inputs are pending, Write 1 to clear

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending_irq
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which pending GPIO inputs are enabled to cause an interrupt

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the registered state of interrupt signals

spirit:register.spirit:name: int_type
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the interrupt type per GPIO

spirit:field.spirit:name: gpio7
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Type 0 : Rising Edge 1 : Falling Edge 2 : Rising or Falling Edge 3 : High Level 4 : Low Level 5-15 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: gpio6
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Type 0 : Rising Edge 1 : Falling Edge 2 : Rising or Falling Edge 3 : High Level 4 : Low Level 5-15 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: gpio5
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Type 0 : Rising Edge 1 : Falling Edge 2 : Rising or Falling Edge 3 : High Level 4 : Low Level 5-15 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: gpio4
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Type 0 : Rising Edge 1 : Falling Edge 2 : Rising or Falling Edge 3 : High Level 4 : Low Level 5-15 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: gpio3
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Type 0 : Rising Edge 1 : Falling Edge 2 : Rising or Falling Edge 3 : High Level 4 : Low Level 5-15 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: gpio2
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Type 0 : Rising Edge 1 : Falling Edge 2 : Rising or Falling Edge 3 : High Level 4 : Low Level 5-15 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: gpio1
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Type 0 : Rising Edge 1 : Falling Edge 2 : Rising or Falling Edge 3 : High Level 4 : Low Level 5-15 : Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: gpio0
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Type 0 : Rising Edge 1 : Falling Edge 2 : Rising or Falling Edge 3 : High Level 4 : Low Level 5-15 : Reserved

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
